The quote is attributed to Eufemia Culla: a lawmaker in the Philippine House of Representatives, and her daughter was killed in clashes between the military and rebels in November 2020.
The quote: written in a mix of English and Tagalog, mentions other politicians and activists.
The original graphic was published on th: CBN on November 29, 2020, and a representative from ABS-CBN confirmed that the manipulated graphic did not come from them.
